channel.title: A couple of questions
channel.description:
Hi, I'm developing a server through the TestScape, and I'm trying to fix minor bugs. Anyway, I need....
1.How to get rid of the multi-hitting when your not using your weapon, you're just hitting them fast. 2.How to not get disconnected whenever I use ::noclip, and make it so only mods and up can use it. 3.How to make it that I can train on hay, doors, and dummies without being disconnected.
If my questions can be answered, when my server is finished, the one who is most helpful may become the Co-Owner!

item.title: A couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

Ok thanks, if you find any info on my other questions, it’d be helpful to know.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of questions
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

I can answer number 2, do do this, go into ur client.java and search for “noclip” after you get to it, look for playerright = ? just replace the question mark with 1

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of questions
